text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, monandi on kofiron maʙosed, ki dar ʙorai ʙarodaroni xud, ki ʙa safar jo ʙa cang rafta ʙudand, meguftand: «Agar nazdi po monda ʙudand, namemurdand, jo kusta namesudand». Xudo in gumonro cun hasrate dar dili onho nihod. Va Xudost, ki zinda mekunad va memironad va Ust, ki korhoi sumoro meʙinad
